About Me

Welcome to my developer portfolio! I'm Miracle, a skilled and creative web developer with a passion for creating beautiful, responsive and user-friendly websites. I have worked on a variety of web projects, ranging from personal e-commerce platforms, standard company websites and personal projects. I have just graduated from a short term web development program in which I obtained my first certificate -Diploma in Frontend Web Development. I have also built multiple local projects which can be found right here on my GITHUB PAGE. I'm looking for a job as a front-end developer to get access to hand on experience to go beyond class objectives to life projects.
